title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 22, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Apr 22, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Ddd
items.content_text:
### Sample Projects / JVM languages

*   [https://github.com/felipexw/clean-arch-ddd-intro (⭐21)](https://github.com/felipexw/clean-arch-ddd-intro) - Simple DDD + Clean Architecture using Micronaut.
items.content_html:
Sample Projects / JVM languages

  • https://github.com/felipexw/clean-arch-ddd-intro (⭐21) - Simple DDD + Clean Architecture using Micronaut.

items.title: Awesome Vue
items.content_text:
### Components & Libraries / Utilities

*   [vuex-masked-modules (⭐2)](https://github.com/Silksofthesoul/vuex-masked-modules) - A Vuex plugin put data structure of the module in localStorage, with the ability to mask or encrypt the data to make it difficult to explore. Designed for Vue 3 and Vuex 4.
items.content_html:
Components & Libraries / Utilities

  • vuex-masked-modules (⭐2) - A Vuex plugin put data structure of the module in localStorage, with the ability to mask or encrypt the data to make it difficult to explore. Designed for Vue 3 and Vuex 4.

items.title: Awesome Sitecore
items.content_text:
### Commerce

*   [Sitecore Commerce Engine UPS Address Validation plugin](https://github.com/XCentium/SC-Plugin-UPS-Address-Validation) - Allows validating shipping address or billing address to make product delivery a good experience.
items.content_html:
Commerce

  • Sitecore Commerce Engine UPS Address Validation plugin - Allows validating shipping address or billing address to make product delivery a good experience.

items.title: Awesome Cassandra
items.content_text:
### Cassandra Performance Tuning / Cassandra as a Service / Managed Cassandra Based on Proprietary Technology

*   [Gatling DSE Stress (⭐5)](https://github.com/datastax/gatling-dse-stress) - Tool for stress testing DSE.

### Integrating with Cassandra / Search / Secondary Indexes

*   [Elassandra](http://www.elassandra.io/) - Elassandra = Elasticsearch as a Cassandra secondary index.

### Open Source Applications / Custom Time Series

*   [Twissandra (⭐802)](https://github.com/twissandra/twissandra) - Twissandra is an example project, created to learn and demonstrate how to use Cassandra. Running the project will present a website that has similar functionality to Twitter.

### Slides / Custom Time Series

*   [Hardening Cassandra for Compliance or Paranoia](https://www.slideshare.net/zznate/hardening-cassandra-for-compliance-or-paranoia) - Includes details on configuring SSL, setting up a certificate authority and creating certificates and trust chains for the JVM.
items.content_html:
Cassandra Performance Tuning / Cassandra as a Service / Managed Cassandra Based on Proprietary Technology

  • Gatling DSE Stress (⭐5) - Tool for stress testing DSE.

Integrating with Cassandra / Search / Secondary Indexes

  • Elassandra - Elassandra = Elasticsearch as a Cassandra secondary index.

Open Source Applications / Custom Time Series

  • Twissandra (⭐802) - Twissandra is an example project, created to learn and demonstrate how to use Cassandra. Running the project will present a website that has similar functionality to Twitter.

Slides / Custom Time Series

  • Hardening Cassandra for Compliance or Paranoia - Includes details on configuring SSL, setting up a certificate authority and creating certificates and trust chains for the JVM.

items.title: Awesome Crystal
items.content_text:
### Algorithms and Data structures

*   [splay\_tree\_map (⭐16)](https://github.com/wyhaines/splay_tree_map.cr) - Splay Tree implementation that conforms to the Hash ducktype

### Debugging

*   [backtracer.cr (⭐16)](https://github.com/Sija/backtracer.cr) - Shard aiming to assist with parsing backtraces into a structured form
*   [debug.cr (⭐96)](https://github.com/Sija/debug.cr) - `debug!(…)` macro for `pp`-style debugging

### Misc

*   [serf-handler.cr (⭐1)](https://github.com/wyhaines/serf-handler.cr) - Framework for building Serf handlers, with a suite of useful builtin capabilities
items.content_html:
Algorithms and Data structures

  • splay_tree_map (⭐16) - Splay Tree implementation that conforms to the Hash ducktype

Debugging

  • backtracer.cr (⭐16) - Shard aiming to assist with parsing backtraces into a structured form
  • debug.cr (⭐96) - debug!(…) macro for pp-style debugging

Misc

  • serf-handler.cr (⭐1) - Framework for building Serf handlers, with a suite of useful builtin capabilities

items.content_html:
Packages / Parsing

items.title: Awesome Machine Learning
items.content_text:
### Tools / Misc

*   [MLReef](https://about.mlreef.com/) - MLReef is an end-to-end development platform using the power of git to give structure and deep collaboration possibilities to the ML development process.
items.content_html:
Tools / Misc

items.title: Awesome Ebpf
items.content_text:
### Tutorials / Hardware Offload

*   [How I ended up writing opensnoop in pure C using eBPF](https://bolinfest.github.io/opensnoop-native/) - A thorough walk-through of how to write eBPF programs, first using only bpf() syscall, and then libbpf library, with reproducible code examples.
items.content_html:
Tutorials / Hardware Offload

  • How I ended up writing opensnoop in pure C using eBPF - A thorough walk-through of how to write eBPF programs, first using only bpf() syscall, and then libbpf library, with reproducible code examples.

items.title: Awesome Jamstack

Platforms

  • Azure Static Web Apps - Full-stack serverless hosting with integrated CI/CD workflow, authentication, CDN and more.

items.title: Awesome Icons
items.content_text:

*   [css.gg](https://css.gg/) - Open-source CSS, SVG, and Figma UI Icons available in SVG Sprite, styled-components, NPM & API

Generic

items.title: Awesome Piracy
items.content_text:
### Trackers / Public Trackers

*   [BTDB](https://btdb.eu/) Large BitTorrent DHT search engine
*   [BTDigg](https://btdig.com/) BTDigg is a popular BitTorrent DHT search engine.

### DDL Link Sites / Free Indexers

*   [Tinymkv](https://tinymkv.xyz/) High quality small size movies/tv shows. It also does high quality HEVC movies.

### Streaming Sites / Anime

*   [Anime Kayo](https://animekayo.com/) Up to 1080p DDL links, mostly Google Drive (no longer updated, site is still accessible)

### Music Downloading / Third Party Hosts

*   [YouTube to MP3](https://ytformp3.com/)

### Mobile Apps / Third Party Hosts

*   [YouTube Vanced](https://vancedapp.com/) Vanced is a well known modded version of YouTube with many features such as adblocking and background playback and many more.
items.content_html:
Trackers / Public Trackers

  • BTDB Large BitTorrent DHT search engine
  • BTDigg BTDigg is a popular BitTorrent DHT search engine.

DDL Link Sites / Free Indexers

  • Tinymkv High quality small size movies/tv shows. It also does high quality HEVC movies.

Streaming Sites / Anime

  • Anime Kayo Up to 1080p DDL links, mostly Google Drive (no longer updated, site is still accessible)

Music Downloading / Third Party Hosts

  • YouTube to MP3

Mobile Apps / Third Party Hosts

  • YouTube Vanced Vanced is a well known modded version of YouTube with many features such as adblocking and background playback and many more.
